statements: SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT asset_name, asset_price FROM assets WHERE asset_quantity > 1000;
SELECT asset_type, asset_quantity FROM assets WHERE asset_price > 5000 ORDER BY asset_quantity DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_price FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Bonds' ORDER BY asset_price ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_quantity FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Real Estate' AND asset_quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_price > 1000 ORDER BY asset_id DESC, asset_quantity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_quantity <= 50 ORDER BY asset_id ASC
SELECT asset_name, asset_price FROM assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY asset_price DESC
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, asset_quantity FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stocks' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY asset_id
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 1000;
SELECT AVG(asset_value) AS average_value FROM assets;
SELECT calculation_id, var_value, calculation_date FROM var_calculation WHERE var_value < -500;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, var_value FROM assets INNER JOIN var_calculation ON assets.asset_id = var_calculation.asset_id;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_value FROM assets ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value, calculation_date FROM assets JOIN var_calculation ON assets.asset_id = var_calculation.asset_id WHERE var_calculation.var_value > 5000;
SELECT * FROM assets INNER JOIN var_calculation ON assets.asset_id = var_calculation.asset_id WHERE calculation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM asset_info;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM asset_info ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM asset_info WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM market_data WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM asset_info WHERE asset_type = 'Stock';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM asset_info WHERE asset_id > 100 ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(price), MIN(price), AVG(price) FROM market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT asset_id, SUM(var_value) AS total_var FROM var_calculation WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY asset_id HAVING total_var > 50000 ORDER BY total_var DESC;
SELECT asset_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM market_data GROUP BY asset_id HAVING num_records > 10 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets WHERE asset_type='Stock';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_value FROM assets ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_type='Bond' AND asset_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date='2022-05-01';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM assets;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT asset_name, daily_return FROM assets JOIN historical_data ON assets.asset_id = historical_data.asset_id;
SELECT portfolio_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM portfolio GROUP BY portfolio_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT assets.asset_name, var_results.date, var_results.var_value FROM assets JOIN portfolio ON assets.asset_id = portfolio.asset_id JOIN var_results ON portfolio.portfolio_id = var_results.portfolio_id WHERE assets.asset_type = 'Stock' ORDER BY var_results.var_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM Asset;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM Asset WHERE asset_value > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM Asset WHERE asset_type = 'Stock' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_value FROM Asset ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT asset_type FROM Asset;
SELECT * FROM Asset WHERE asset_type = 'Stock' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM Asset WHERE asset_value > 10000 ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_value FROM Asset WHERE asset_type = 'Real Estate' ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT asset_type FROM Asset;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_value FROM Asset WHERE asset_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 20000 ORDER BY asset_value DESC, asset_name ASC;
